# RES APIs (Test Version)

```{warning}
This page is under heavy development
```

## RESource Builder

The `RESources_builder` class is the main entry point for the RESource framework. It provides a unified interface for renewable energy resource assessment.

```{eval-rst}
.. py:class:: RES.RESources.RESources_builder

   Main builder class for RESource framework.
   
   .. py:method:: get_grid_cells()
   
      Retrieves the default grid cells for the region.
      
   .. py:method:: get_temporal_data()
   
      Retrieves temporal data for the region.
```
